title: Nominations for Training Courses scheduled during January to March 2026.
Inviting nominations for different Capacity Building Training Programs at Arun Jaitely National Institute of Financial Management (AJNIFM) Faridabad.
Training Program on "Team Building and leadership" at Silver Sands Sea Princess Beach Resort, Port Blair, during 2nd to 6th March, 2026.
NPC Training Program on "Systematic Problem Solving, Conflict resolution and change Management" from 9th to 13th February at Goa.
